function.name: water_dispense
function.description: This function is used to dispense water from a water purifier as requested by the user.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to dispense water.

foodRecipeName.description: The name of the food recipe to be prepared using the water purifier.

waterAmount.description: The amount of water to be dispensed.

predefinedWaterAmountUnit.description: The unit of the predefined water amount.

predefinedWaterPurifyingMode.description: The predefined water purifying mode to be set.
